channel.title: CVE Feed for azexo -- Elastik Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for azexo -- Elastik Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-9274|2024-10-01T15:47:56.017Z -- azexo -- elastik%20page%20builder
item.description: The Elastik Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via SVG File uploads in all versions up to, and including, 0.27.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file.

item.title: CVE-2024-9274|2024-10-01T07:30:10.278Z -- azexo -- elastik%20page%20builder
item.description: The Elastik Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via SVG File uploads in all versions up to, and including, 0.27.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file.
